title: (Amendment) (No. 2) Act 1977 (No. 28 of 1977), hereby order as follows:
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Justice (Delegation of Ministerial
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Justice (Delegation of Ministerial 

Functions) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited justice (delegation ministerial functions) order 2024

title: (Amendment) (No. 2) Act 1977 (No. 28 of 1977), hereby order as follows:
heading: 2. The powers (other than the power to prosecute an offence) and duties of
text_raw:
2. The powers (other than the power to prosecute an offence) and duties of 

the Minister for Justice conferred on her - 

(a) 

by or under the enactments specified in Part 1 of the Schedule, 
and 

(b) under the Regulations specified in Part 2 of the Schedule, 

are delegated to James Browne, Minister of State at the Department of Justice. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 19th July, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [355] 3
text_norm: 2 power (other power prosecute offence) duty minister justice conferred - (a) enactment specified part 1 schedule (b) regulation specified part 2 schedule delegated james browne minister state department justice notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 19th july 2024 355 3

title: (Amendment) (No. 2) Act 1977 (No. 28 of 1977), hereby order as follows:
heading: Firearms Act 1925 (No. 17 of 1925)
text_raw:
SCHEDULE 

Part 1 

Firearms Act 1925 (No. 17 of 1925) 

Betting Act 1931 (No. 27 of 1931) 

Gaming and Lotteries Act 1956 (No. 2 of 1956) 

Firearms Act 1964 (No. 1 of 1964) 

Part III of the Firearms and Offensive Weapons Act 1990 (No. 12 of 1990) 

Firearms (Firearm Certificates for Non-Residents) Act 2000 (No. 20 of 2000) 

European Union (Acquisition and Possession of Weapons and Ammunition) 
Regulations 2022 (S.I. No. 209 of 2022) 

Part 2 

GIVEN under the Official Seal 
of the Government, 
16 July, 2024. 

SIMON HARRIS, 

Taoiseach. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [355]
